title: Primary Care Physician
description: We will contact your preferred provider below to review your qualifications and to sign the Requisition Form if qualified.

title: Confidential Information
description: Test results are protected by the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act of 2008 preventing use for employment consideration or health insurance coverage.

title: Patient Responsibility
description: Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) approved the cancer screening as a one-time lifetime preventive benefit non-inclusive of co-pays or deductibles. Therefore, this program is exlusive to Medicare or Medicaid members.

title: I understand the following information regarding the test purpose and methodology
description: The purpose of this molecular genetic test is to determine if I carry any mutation(s) causing an increased risk to develop Cancer.

title: Positive
description: A mutation was identified in a gene associated with increased Cancer susceptibility specific type(s) of Cancer depend on the particular gene. based on what is known about the gene(s) in which a mutation was found.

title: Nagative
description: No mutations were identified in any of the genes tested. This result greatly reduces the likelihood that you will have a mutation in the genes tested see limitations of testing. Your healthcare provider will make Cancer screening and medical management recommendations based on your personal and or family history.

title: Varient
description: Variant - An alteration was identified in one or more genes; however, there is not enough information to determine whether this change is associated with in increased risk for Cancer. A thorough review of the variant and the associated literature may suggest that a variant is more likely to be disease-causing or benign.  However, in some cases the significance remains unclear. Your healthcare provider will make Cancer screening and medical management recommendations  based on your personal and/or family history.
